xccm_selftest.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains the self-test functions for the CCM core.

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who     Date     Changes
 ----- ------- -------- ----------------------------------------------
 6.0   adk     03/06/14 First Release.
                        Implemented XCcm_SelfTest function.

#include "xccm.h"
#include "xstatus.h"

Functions

int XCcm_SelfTest (XCcm *InstancePtr)

Function Documentation

int XCcm_SelfTest ( XCcm *  InstancePtr  ) 

This function reads Version register of CCM core and compares with zero as part of self test.

Parameters:
InstancePtr is a pointer to XCcm instance.
Returns:
  • XST_SUCCESS if the test is successful.
  • XST_FAILURE if the test is failed.
Note:
None.
